HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Learn any language in three simple steps.

step1.title: Step 1: Choose & Create
step1.subtitle: Start your language journey in seconds.
step1.selectNative: Select your native language from the left dropdown.
step1.chooseTarget: Choose target language from the right dropdown.
step1.describeWhatToLearn: Describe what you want to learn - be as specific as you need:
step1.example1: I have a job interview for a software developer position next week
step1.example2: Going to Barcelona, need help ordering food and buying museum tickets
step1.example3: Business meeting phrases for my trip to London
step1.proTip: The more details you provide about your situation, the more personalized and useful your flashcards will be!
step1.clickToChange: Click a language to change the interface language

step2.title: Step 2: Practice & Learn
step2.subtitle: Master new vocabulary through interactive exercises.
step2.multipleChoice: View your flashcard with 4 multiple-choice options and track your progress.
step2.checkTranslations: Select answers and flip cards to check translations. See your progress for each answer.
step2.listenPronunciation: Listen to correct pronunciation of words and example sentences in both languages.
step2.addMoreCards: Add more flashcards to any existing category with a single click.
step2.filterByLanguage: Filter flashcards by language to focus on what you want to learn.
step2.trackProgress: Track your learning progress with categories for 'Learning' and 'Mastered' items.
step2.filterDescription: Filter your flashcards by language or progress status to focus your learning:

step3.title: Step 3: Track & Improve
step3.subtitle: Monitor your progress and reach your goals faster.
step3.seeMastered: See what you've mastered and what's left to learn.
step3.setTargets: Set daily learning targets that work for you.
step3.viewCharts: View visual progress charts to stay motivated.
step3.smartRepetition: Benefit from smart repetition that adapts to your learning.

Cookie.title: Privacy Policy & Cookies
Cookie.description: This site only uses necessary cookies for proper functioning. We temporarily store flashcard data for non-logged in users and remember your cookie preferences.
Cookie.necessaryDesc: Required for basic site functions: authentication via Clerk, storing flashcards in guest mode, and remembering cookie consent preferences.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Flashcards AI. Protecting your personal data is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have regarding it.

dataCollection.title: 2. What data we collect
dataCollection.content: We only collect essential data needed for the application to function:
dataCollection.accountDataDesc: Authentication data via Clerk service (email address). This data is stored by Clerk in accordance with their privacy policy.
dataCollection.userContentDesc: Flashcards you create (original text, translation, usage examples, categories) and learning statistics (progress in mastering the material).
dataCollection.tempDataDesc: In guest mode, we temporarily store your flashcards in your browser's memory to allow you to use the application without logging in.

cookies.title: 3. How we use cookies
cookies.content: Our site only uses essential cookies and similar technologies:
cookies.necessaryCookiesDesc: Enable basic functions such as secure login and site navigation. The Clerk service uses its own cookies for authentication and session management.
cookies.localStorageDesc: We use your browser's memory to store flashcards in guest mode and remember your cookie preferences.
cookies.noCookies: We do not use any cookies for marketing, tracking, or analytics purposes.

externalServices.title: 4. External services
externalServices.content: We use the following external services:
externalServices.clerkDesc: For authentication and user account management. Clerk may collect data such as email address, IP, or browser information in accordance with their own privacy policy.
externalServices.openaiDesc: For generating flashcard content using their API. Only data necessary for content generation is transmitted; we do not share users' personal data.
externalServices.policy: Each of these services has its own privacy policy, which can be found on their websites.

dataStorage.title: 5. Data storage
dataStorage.accountData: User account and learning progress data are stored in a PostgreSQL database with secured connection. We store this data as long as you have an account on our service.
dataStorage.guestData: For non-logged in users, flashcard data is stored exclusively in your browser's memory and is not transmitted to our servers.

changes.title: 6. Changes to the privacy policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes via in-app notification.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us:
